ausflora 0.0.2.9000
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    align_taxa()

    Find taxonomic alignments for a list of names

    create_species_state_origin_matrix()

    Process Geographic Data and Return State Level Species Origin and Diversity Counts

    create_taxonomic_update_lookup()

    Create a lookup table to help fix the taxonomy for a list of Australian plant species

    dataset_access_function()

    Access Australian Plant Census Dataset

    default_version()

    Get the default version for stable data

    load_taxonomic_resources()

    Load taxonomic resources

    standardise_names()

    Standardise Taxon Names

    state_diversity_counts()

    Calculate state-level diversity for native, introduced, and more complicated species origins

    strip_names()

    Strip taxonomic names of subtaxa designations and special characters

    update_taxonomy()

    Use APC and APNI to update taxonomy, replacing synonyms to current taxa where relevant
